education.degree: M.Tech ML Applications in Signal Processing
education.details: Specialized in Data Analytics and Machine Learning for Signal Processing and Communciation Systems
Focused on Electronics and Communication Engineering

details: End-to-end testing for next-generation agentic framework services.
Designed and implemented a mock server to simulate real customer interactions.
Conducted comprehensive accuracy and load testing to determine optimal concurrency parameters.
Validated seamless integration between API execution services.
Comprehensive testing of the company-wide AI backbone platform supporting millions of customer interactions.
Coordinated cross-team integration testing with 7+ product teams and 20+ engineers.
End-to-end testing for ML pipelines, significantly reducing production incidents.
Deployed OpenSearch in AWS environment and handled index creations and maintenance.
Tested FAQ ingestion processes across the enterprise in Elastic Search and later OpenSearch.
Developed automated testing protocols for ingestion processes handling millions of documents.
Architected and developed a comprehensive AI testing framework using FastAPI.
Built a quality metrics system incorporating BLEU, ROUGE, recall, and F1 scores.
Developed and fine-tuned in-house models for sentiment analysis and language detection.
Created a modular architecture allowing for 5-minute integration into any product.
Designed intuitive documentation and UI using MkDocs.
Tested auto-classification system for customer support tickets, improving routing accuracy.
Developed a validation framework for ML prediction models, establishing quality gates for production deployment.
Conducted end-to-end testing for the entire triage process.
End-to-end testing of microservices serving multiple products via REST APIs.
